body_html: Any interest in getting PyTorch to work with WorkQueue (master-worker with APIs) via the HTCondor scheduler? Doing so would be able to achieve scale without some of the performance issues of MPI.
body_text: Any interest in getting PyTorch to work with WorkQueue (master-worker with APIs) via the HTCondor scheduler? Doing so would be able to achieve scale without some of the performance issues of MPI.
